content.prompt:
The Metropolitan Museum of Art/Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Klaus G. Perls, 1990

The artist creates formal balance in this plaque from the Kingdom of Benin by

choices.label: creating an illusion of depth in which the figures exist
producing symmetry through the placement of the figures
exaggerating the proportions of the figures in stylized fashion
creating distinct registers that separate each of the figures

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
